name: silence in the warehouse small horror themed game
name_original: silence in the warehouse small horror themed game
description: silence in the warehouse is a small horror themed prototype game with psychological elements that is also my first time using bitsy so the chances of anyone finding bugs is high but remember first time using the bitsy engine okay you have the option to skip everything and make it to the end but if you really wanna know the story(or at the very least the bits of what is the story) you must explore and read for yourself.
